rooms.name: Main Living Area
rooms.description: A central open space designed following the Kerala tradition with high ceilings and wooden beams. It serves as a reception area for guests, integrates natural light through large windows, and includes traditional stone features.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A traditional Kerala dining space with a wooden tiled floor and open view to the garden. Natural ventilation is ensured through strategic placement of windows.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: An integrated kitchen area featuring modern appliances within a traditional Kerala design aesthetic, ensuring ample natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious guest bedroom designed with natural light, ventilation, and a private balcony. Vastu principles are adhered to by positioning the bed towards the east.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Small guest bathroom with traditional Kerala finishes and an emphasis on natural light.

openings.description: A large front door incorporating traditional wooden elements and ornate detailing, ensuring a welcoming entry.
Balcony door leading to a private balcony space for the guest room.
Entry point to an outdoor swimming pool area integrated with natural landscaping and traditional Kerala aesthetics.

exterior_features.name: Swimming Pool Area
exterior_features.description: An elegant swimming pool area, designed to be in harmony with Vastu principles and traditional Kerala landscaping. The pool is surrounded by stone paving and lush greenery.

exterior_features.name: Balcony for Primary Bedroom 1
exterior_features.description: A spacious balcony adjoining the primary bedroom, featuring privacy screens and open design to promote ventilation.

exterior_features.name: Balcony for Primary Bedroom 2
exterior_features.description: A similar balcony setup for the second primary bedroom, ensuring ample space and natural light exposure.

additional_spaces.name: Storage Closet
additional_spaces.description: Dedicated storage space integrated into the design for household items and traditional Kerala decorative elements.

additional_spaces.name: Service Area
additional_spaces.description: Area designated for service utilities, maintenance, and equipment in line with Vastu guidelines.
